review: My mother was treated by the doctor today. they were really happy by the way the doctor treated my parents.The doctor has rich experience which is seen in the way he handles the patient. Would definitely recommend

review: The wait time was a pian and no patient can wait for an hour in hospital when all they would want is rest.The doctor is experienced but is rude and on face which was not acceptable.

Please avoid this doctor ** *** **** *** *** ***** ** **** ***** ***** I brought my mother into Jayshree Hospital Emergency room,,, Doctor comes in after one hour and doesn't even listen to his patients ..is super arrogant********* *** **** *** *** *** **************** ********* ********* ** *** **** ************ ***Had to take her out of Jayshree *** **** ** ************ *** ***** *** ** ******
